Package imagingbook.common.sift

This package implements David Lowe's SIFT feature detection. TODO: cleanup point-related classes (KeyPoint, SiftKeyPoint, SiftDescriptor)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KeyPoint
    Represents a SIFT key point in hierarchical scale space.
    SiftDescriptor
    SIFT descriptor.
    SiftDetector
    This class implements the detection of SIFT features from images.
    SiftDetector.Parameters
    Default parameters; a (usually modified) instance of this class may be passed to constructor of SiftDetector.
    SiftMatch  
    SiftMatch3  
    SiftMatcher  
    SiftMatcher.Parameters  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FeatureDistanceNorm  
    SiftDetector.NeighborhoodType3D
    Types of 3D neighborhoods used in min/max detection
